job.title: Senior Software Engineer - Embedded
job.description: If you are a Senior Software Engineer with embedded experience, please read on!  Top Reasons to Work with Us  For nearly 50 years, we have served an integral role in supporting the advancement of the aerospace and defense industries. We are a pioneer and world leader in high-reliability data communications and control technology. To be frank, we are one of the most exciting, promising Aerospace and Defense companies in North America.  What You Will Be Doing What You Need for this Position So, if you are a Senior Software Enginner with experience, please apply today! Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:  Jackson.Hufferd@CyberCoders.com Jackson Hufferd - Sr. Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders  Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. - In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
